modName: Requiem and Imps More Complex Needs compatibility patch
summary: This patch adds appropriate nutrition effects from Imp\'s More Complex Needs to the food and meats added by Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img=center]http://i.imgur.com/vt1RluA.jpg[/img][/center]

This patch adds appropriate nutrition effects from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639]Imp\'s More Complex Needs[/url] to the food and meats added by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281]Requiem[/url].

This patch might become unnecessary when/if Imp of the Perverse decides to make an official patch for Requiem, but in the meantime it should do the job.

[center][img=center]http://i.imgur.com/WpT2Q.png[/img][/center]

[b]REQUIRED FILES[/b]

[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281]Requiem[/url][/b] v1.7
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639]Imp\'s More Complex Needs[/url][/b] v0.31

[b]INSTALLATION[/b]

The installation is simple:

[b]Nexus Mod Manager users:[/b]
Click \'Download with Manager\'. Once it\'s downloaded simply activate it in NMM.

[b]Manual installation:[/b]
Unzip the contents of the file to your Data folder. Activate the plug-in with your mod-manager of choice or in the Data Files section of the Skyrim Launcher.

[b]LOAD ORDER[/b]

Any place below Requiem.esp and Imp\'s More Complex Needs.esp should work.

[b]UNINSTALLATION[/b]

[b]Nexus Mod Manager users:[/b]
Deactivate the mod in NMM. That\'s it.

[b]Manual installation:[/b]
De-activate the plug-in with your mod-manager of choice or in the Data Files section of the Skyrim Launcher, then remove \"IMCN - Requiem Patch.esp\" from your Data folder.

[b]CONFLICTS AND KNOWN ISSUES[/b]

There should be no issues or conflicts at all, since only the effects and keywords of Xarrian\'s ingestibles were changed to work with IMCN.

[b]CHANGE LOG[/b]

v1.0c Fixed stupid mistake. Cooked meat now counts as cooked meat instead of ale.
v1.0b Updated to work with Requiem 1.7 and IMCN 0.31
v1.0 Initial release.

[b]CREDITS AND PERSMISSIONS[/b]

Xarrian and ogerboss - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]
Imp of the Perverse - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639]Imp\'s More Complex Needs[/url]
[b]Thanks to these two awesome modders for their work![/b] Don\'t forget to endorse their work if you enjoy it.

Author: Gatonegro
Contact: Message elgatoenlaluna on the Nexus Sites.
author: Gatonegro

files.changelogHtml: Updated to work with Requiem 1.7 and IMCN 0.31
